heroTitle: I am Mykhailo Shpeh - Front-End Developer
aboutText: I am a Junior Front-End Developer with skills in HTML, CSS/SASS, and JavaScript. I am learning modern web development technologies and creating responsive, adaptive websites. I have experience with markup, basic JavaScript, and I am acquainted with version control systems (Git). I am currently studying at GoITeens School. I am looking forward to growing in front-end development by working on real projects and am open to new challenges.
arrangementTitle: I am excited about the possibility of working with you
